finnish.title: Last Supper: Fruitfulness & Unity
finnish.Question1: Consider the acts of God described in this passage.
finnish.Question2: What do these illustrate about the ways of God?
finnish.Question3: Have you experienced these ways of God in your life? If yes, how so? If not, what can you do to experience this?
finnish.Question4: What can you do to grow in your desire to know and follow God more intimately this week?
